outputs.output_descr: This project will enhance the following business processess in Atlas: 1)Procurement Integration; 2)Project Management; 3)Service Contracts; 4)Budgeting; 5)Financial Closing; 6) Corporate Reporting; 7)Atlas quality assurance; and 8)Travel.

project_descr: Project to introduce efficiency gains through improvements in the ERP system (Atlas), and innovative ways of doing business.
